fast3d.util

Class SimpleAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.util.SimpleAudio

  • public class SimpleAudio
extends java.lang.Object
    a very simple wrapper around the core-audio-functionalities of java.sampled
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Constructor Summary

      SimpleAudio()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Thread audioPlayer(java.io.File f, double secondsSkipStart, double secondsSkipEnd)
      returns a thread doing the I/O for passing the data from a AudioInputStream upon the given file to a sourceDataLine for playback on the primary mixer
      because the result-thread will do various I/O interrupt() will not work
      static java.lang.Thread audioPlayer(java.lang.String filename)
      a wrapper around audioPlayer(File,double,double)
      skip at begin and end will be 0.0 seconds
      because the result-thread will do various I/O interrupt() will not work

        requests the mixer from the system
        Parameters:
        info - information what a mixer has to be requested
        Returns:
        the mixer that is requested or null if it is not available

        public static javax.sound.sampled.Mixer getPrimaryMixer()
        requests the first mixer available in the system
        Returns:
        the first mixer that the system provides information for or null if something failed

      • playAudio

        public static javax.sound.sampled.SourceDataLine playAudio(javax.sound.sampled.Mixer mixer)
        requests a line to play raw audio data on from the mixer
        Parameters:
        mixer - the line-combining audio device
        Returns:
        a line to play audio on or null if that is not possible with the given mixer

      • recordAudio

        requests a line, to record raw audio data from, from the mixer
        Parameters:
        mixer - the line-combining audio device
        Returns:
        a raw-audio-line or null if that is not possible with the given mixer

        opens the file and reads the header
        Parameters:
        f - the file to get audio data from
        Returns:
        a stream of raw audio data encoded like described in the files header or null if anything failed

      • playAudio

        public static java.lang.Thread playAudio(java.lang.String filename)
        a wrapper around audioPlayer(String)
        because the result-thread will do various I/O interrupt() will not work
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file to play
        Returns:
        a already started thread playing the file
        See Also:
        audioPlayer(String)

      • audioPlayer

        public static java.lang.Thread audioPlayer(java.lang.String filename)
        a wrapper around audioPlayer(File,double,double)
        skip at begin and end will be 0.0 seconds
        because the result-thread will do various I/O interrupt() will not work
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file to play
        Returns:
        a not started thread playing the file
        See Also:
        audioPlayer(File,double,double)

      • audioPlayer

        public static java.lang.Thread audioPlayer(java.io.File f,
                                           double secondsSkipStart,
                                           double secondsSkipEnd)
        returns a thread doing the I/O for passing the data from a AudioInputStream upon the given file to a sourceDataLine for playback on the primary mixer
        because the result-thread will do various I/O interrupt() will not work
        Parameters:
        f - the file to play
        secondsSkipStart - how many seconds (not milliseconds) to skip at the begin of the audio-data
        secondsSkipEnd - how many seconds (not milliseconds) to skip at the end of the audio-data
        Returns:
        a not started thread playing the file
